definitions.body: grandson of Eli 1Sa 14:3, 1Ch 5:33, 1Ch 5:34, 1Ch 6:11, 1Ch 6:12; father of Ahimelech 1Sa 22:9, 1Sa 22:20 ([[אֲחִטוּב]]) v:1Sa 22:11, v:1Sa 22:12 (on iden-tity of pers. v. Be 1Ch 5:33).
father of Zadok 2Sa 8:17 (= 1Ch 18:16), but We rds. Ahim son of Ahitub; 1Ch 5:37, Ezr 7:2; grandfather of Zadok 1Ch 9:11, Ne 11:11 (on all cf. We l.c.)
